Chen Li Gong Xiao first year
Song Hui Gong Tao first year
Fourteenth year, King Xuan ascended the throne, the Gonghe administration ended.
Jiaxu
Xuan Wang first year
Chu Xiong Shuang first year
Yan Li Hou Zhuang first year
Lu Wu Gong Ao first year
Cao Dai Bo Xian first year
Qi Li Gong Wu Ji first year
Jin Xian Hou Ji first year
Qin Zhuang Gong Qi first year
Chu Xiong Xun first year
Jia Shen
Lu Yi Gong Xi first year
Qi Wen Gong Chi first year
Wei Wu Gong He first year
Mu Hou Fu Sheng first year
Cai Li Hou Suo Shi first year
Four times took Qi women as consorts.
Jia Wu

cells.content: 魯孝公稱元年，伯御立為君，稱為諸公子云。伯御，武公孫。
cells.translation: Lu Xiao Gong Cheng first year, Bo Yu established as ruler, called various princes. Bo Yu, Wu Gong's grandson.

cells.content: 鄭桓公友元年始封。周宣王母弟。
cells.translation: Zheng Huan Gong You first year began enfeoffment. Zhou Xuan Wang's younger brother.
Seven, attacked Tiaosheng Crown Prince Chou.
Qi Cheng Gong Yue first year

cells.content: 十以千畝戰。生仇弟成師。二子名反，君子譏之。後亂。
cells.translation: Ten, fought over a thousand mou. Gave birth to Chou's younger brother Cheng Shi. Two sons' names reversed, gentleman criticized it. Later chaos.
Thirty-one, Song Hui Gong died.
Chu Xiong E first year
Song Dai Gong established. First year
Jia Chen

cells.content: 十一周宣王誅伯御，立其弟稱，是為孝公。
cells.translation: Eleven, Zhou Xuan Wang executed Bo Yu, established his younger brother Cheng, this was Xiao Gong.
Chen Wu Gong Ling first year
Cao Hui Bo Zhi first year
Qi Zhuang Gong Shu first year
Chu Ruo Ao first year
Yan Qing Hou first year
Jia Yin

cells.content: 二十七穆侯卒，弟殤叔自立，太子仇出奔。
cells.translation: Twenty-seven, Mu Hou died, younger brother Shang Shu self-established, Crown Prince Chou fled.
Jin Shang Shu first year
You Wang first year

cells.content: 四仇攻殺殤叔，立為文侯。
cells.translation: Four, Chou attacked and killed Shang Shu, established as Wen Hou.
Two, three rivers earthquake.
Jin Wen Hou Chou first year
Chen Yi Gong Yue first year
Three, Wang took Bao Si.
Jia Zi
Qin Xiang Gong first year
Chen Ping Gong Xie first year
Eleven, You Wang killed by Dog Rong.
Seven, began ranked as feudal lords.

cells.content: 三十六以幽王故，為犬戎所殺。
cells.translation: Thirty-six, because of You Wang, killed by Dog Rong.
Ping Wang first year moved east to Luo city.
Eight, initially established western altar, sacrificed to White Thearch.
Zheng Wu Gong Hua Tu first year
Lu Hui Gong Fu Ting first year
Jia Xu
Twelve, attacked Rong to Qi and died.
Yan Ai Hou first year
Qin Wen Gong first year
Song Wu Gong Si Kong first year
Yan Zheng Hou first year
Chu Xiao Ao first year
Cai Gong Hou Xing first year
Ten, married Shen Hou's daughter Wu Jiang.
Cai Dai Hou first year
Cao Mu Gong first year
Jia Shen
Chu Fen Mao first year
Wei Zhuang Gong Yang first year
Fourteen, gave birth to Zhuang Gong Wu Sheng.
Ten, established Fan altar.
Cao Huan Gong Zhong Sheng first year

cells.content: 陳文公圉元年生桓公鮑、厲公他。他母蔡女。
cells.translation: Chen Wen Gong Yu first year gave birth to Huan Gong Bao, Li Gong Ta. Ta's mother was Cai woman.

cells.content: 十七生大叔段，母欲立段，公不聽。
cells.translation: Seventeen, gave birth to younger brother Duan, mother wished to establish Duan, duke did not listen.
Cai Xuan Hou Kai Lun first year
Eighteen, gave birth to Lu Huan Gong's mother.
Jia Wu
Nineteen, established altar to Chen Bao.
First year of Duke Xuan of Song (Li)

cells.content: 晉昭侯元年封季父成師于曲沃，曲沃大於國，君子譏曰：「晉人亂自曲沃始矣。」
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhao of Jin, enfeoffed uncle Cheng Shi at Quwo. Quwo larger than the state, gentleman criticized: 'Jin disorder begins from Quwo.'
Ten, Duke Wen died.
First year of Duke Huan of Chen

cells.content: 鄭莊公寤生元年祭仲相。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhuang of Zheng (Wu Sheng), Ji Zhong as chancellor.

cells.content: 十七愛妾子州吁，州吁好兵。
cells.translation: Seventeen, favored concubine son Zhou Xu, Zhou Xu fond of war.
King Wu ascended.

cells.content: 潘父殺昭侯，納成師，不克。昭侯子立，是為孝侯。
cells.translation: Pan Fu assassinated Duke Zhao, brought in Cheng Shi, failed. Duke Zhao's son ascended, became Duke Xiao.
Jia Chen

cells.content: 二十三夫人無子，桓公立。
cells.translation: Twenty-three, consort bore no sons, Duke Huan ascended.
First year of Duke Huan of Wei (Wan)

cells.content: 二弟州吁驕，桓黜之，出奔。
cells.translation: Two, younger brother Zhou Xu arrogant, Duke Huan deposed him, fled.

cells.content: 九曲沃桓叔成師卒，子代立，為莊伯。
cells.translation: Nine, Quwo Huan Shu Cheng Shi died, son Dai succeeded, became Zhuang Bo.
First year of Duke Xi of Qi (Lu Fu)

cells.content: 二同母弟夷仲年生公孫毋知也。
cells.translation: Two, same mother younger brother Yi Zhong Yan gave birth to Gong Sun Wu Zhi.

cells.content: 十九公卒，命立弟和，為穆公。
cells.translation: Nineteen, duke died, commanded younger brother He established as Duke Mu.
First year of Duke Mu of Song (He)
First year of Duke Mu of Yan
Jia Yin

cells.content: 十六曲沃莊伯殺孝侯，晉人立孝侯子卻為鄂侯。
cells.translation: Sixteen, Quwo Zhuang Bo assassinated Duke Xiao, Jin people established Duke Xiao's son Que as Duke E.

cells.content: 晉鄂侯卻元年曲沃強於晉。
cells.translation: First year of Duke E of Jin (Que), Quwo stronger than Jin.

cells.content: 魯隱公息姑元年母聲子。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Yin of Lu (Xi Gu), mother Sheng Zi.
Twenty-two, Duan rebelled, fled.

cells.content: 二十三公悔，思母不見，穿地相見。
cells.translation: Twenty-three, duke regretted, longed to see mother but could not, dug tunnel to meet.
Three, second month, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 九公屬孔父立殤公。馮奔鄭。
cells.translation: Nine, duke entrusted Kong Fu to establish Duke Shang. Feng fled to Zheng.
Twenty-four, invaded Zhou, took grain.
First year of King Huan
First year of Duke Shang of Song (Yu Yi)
Sixteen, Zhou Xu assassinated duke self-established.

cells.content: 二十六衛石碏來告，故執州吁。
cells.translation: Twenty-six, Wei Shi Que came to announce, therefore seized Zhou Xu.
Two, sent Duke Guo to attack Quwo in Jin.

cells.content: 五公觀魚于棠，君子譏之。
cells.translation: Five, duke viewed fish at Tang, gentleman criticized.

cells.content: 六鄂侯卒。曲沃莊伯復攻晉。立鄂侯子光為哀侯。
cells.translation: Six, Duke E died. Quwo Zhuang Bo attacked Jin again. Established Duke E's son Guang as Duke Ai.
Two, Zheng attacked us. We attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 衛宣公晉元年共立之。討州吁。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xuan of Wei (Jin), established jointly. Punished Zhou Xu.
Jia Zi
Six, Zheng people came to renegotiate peace.
First year of Duke Ai of Jin (Guang)
Twenty-seven, first audience with king, king did not treat courteously.

cells.content: 二莊伯卒，子稱立，為武公。
cells.translation: Two, Zhuang Bo died, son Cheng succeeded, became Duke Wu.
Eight, exchanged Xu fields, gentleman criticized.
First year of Duke Ning of Qin
Twenty-nine, gave Beng to Lu, exchanged Xu fields.
Nine, third month, great hailstorm, thunder.
First year of Duke Huan of Cai (Feng Ren)

cells.content: 七諸侯敗我。我師與衛人伐鄭。
cells.translation: Seven, feudal lords defeated us. Our army with Wei attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 十一大夫翬請殺桓公，求為相，公不聽，即殺公。
cells.translation: Eleven, grandee Hui requested to kill Duke Huan, sought to be chancellor, duke did not listen, then killed duke.

cells.content: 魯桓公允元年母宋武公女，生手文為魯夫人。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Huan of Lu (Yun), mother was daughter of Duke Wu of Song, gave birth to Shou Wen as Lu consort.

cells.content: 三十三以璧加魯，易許田。
cells.translation: Thirty-three, presented jade to Lu and exchanged the Xu fields.

cells.content: 二宋賂以鼎，入於太廟，君子譏之。
cells.translation: Two, Song bribed with a tripod that was placed in the grand temple, which the gentleman criticized.

cells.content: 華督見孔父妻好，悅之。華督殺孔父，及殺殤公。宋公馮元年華督為相。
cells.translation: Hua Du saw that Kong Fu's wife was beautiful and desired her. Hua Du assassinated Kong Fu and then assassinated Duke Shang. First year of Duke Feng of Song, with Hua Du as chancellor.
First year of Duke Xuan of Yan

cells.content: 三翬迎女，齊侯送女，君子譏之。
cells.translation: Three, Hui welcomed the woman, the Qi lord sent the woman, which the gentleman criticized.
First year of Xiao Zi of Jin
Jia Xu
Thirteen, attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 三十八弟他殺太子免。代立，國亂，再赴。
cells.translation: Thirty-eight, younger brother Ta assassinated Crown Prince Mian. Replaced him on the throne, state fell into chaos, reported death twice.
Thirty-seven, attacked Zhou and wounded the king.
Twenty-five, Shan Rong attacked us.

cells.content: 曲沃武公殺小子。周伐曲沃，立晉哀侯弟湣為晉侯。晉侯湣元年
cells.translation: Wu Gong of Quwo assassinated Xiao Zi. Zhou attacked Quwo and established Duke Ai's younger brother Min as Duke of Jin. First year of Duke Min of Jin

cells.content: 三十五侵隨，隨為善政，得止。
cells.translation: Thirty-five, invaded Sui, which practiced good governance and achieved peace.
First year of Duke Li of Chen (Ta)

cells.content: 三十八太子忽救齊，齊將妻之。
cells.translation: Thirty-eight, Crown Prince Hu rescued Qi, Qi intended to marry him to a daughter.

cells.content: 二生敬仲完。周史卜完後世王齊。
cells.translation: Two, gave birth to Jing Zhong Wan. Zhou historian divined that Wan's descendants would rule Qi.

cells.content: 三十七伐隨，弗拔，但盟，罷兵。
cells.translation: Thirty-seven, attacked Sui but could not take it, so made alliance and withdrew troops.
First year of Chu Zi of Qin
Ten, seized Ji Zhong.
Eighteen, Crown Prince Ji and younger brother Shou contended to the death.
First year of Duke Zhuang of Cao (She Gu)
Seven, the duke debauched Cai, Cai assassinated the duke.
First year of Duke Li of Zheng (Tu)

cells.content: 三十二釐公令毋知秩服如太子。
cells.translation: Thirty-two, Duke Xi ordered Wu Zhi's ranked service to be like the crown prince's.
First year of Duke Hui of Wei (Shuo)
First year of Duke Zhuang of Chen (Lin), son of Duke Huan.

cells.content: 六三父殺出子，立其兄武公。
cells.translation: Six, the three fathers assassinated Chu Zi and established his elder brother Wu Gong.
Three, the feudal lords attacked us to avenge the Song matter.
Jia Shen
Fifteen, the heavenly king demanded chariots, not according to ritual.

cells.content: 齊襄公諸兒元年貶毋知秩服，毋知怨。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xiang of Qi (Zhu Er), demoted Wu Zhi's ranked service, Wu Zhi resented it.

cells.content: 秦武公元年伐彭，至華山。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Wu of Qin, attacked Peng, reached Hua Mountain.
Three, Shuo fled to Qi, established Qian Mu.
Four, Ji Zhong established Hu, the duke went out to reside at Li.
First year of Duke Huan of Yan
First year of King Zhuang, gave birth to son Kui.
Sixteen, the duke met with Cao to plan attacking Zheng.
First year of Qian Mu of Wei

cells.content: 鄭昭公忽元年忽母鄧女，祭仲取之。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhao of Zheng (Hu), Hu's mother was Deng woman, Ji Zhong married her.
Two, had younger brother Ke.

cells.content: 十七日食，不書日，官失之。
cells.translation: Seventeen, solar eclipse, day not recorded, officials erred.
Two, Qu Mi assassinated Duke Zhao.

cells.content: 十八公與夫人如齊，齊侯通焉，使彭生殺公於車上。
cells.translation: Eighteen, the duke and consort went to Qi, the Qi lord seduced her, sent Peng Sheng to assassinate the duke in the chariot.
Four, assassinated Duke Huan of Lu, executed Peng Sheng.
First year of Duke Ai of Cai (Xian Wu)

cells.content: 鄭子亹元年齊殺子亹，昭公弟子。
cells.translation: First year of Zi Wei of Zheng, Qi assassinated Zi Wei, disciple of Duke Zhao.

cells.content: 四周公欲殺王而立子克，王誅周公，克奔燕。
cells.translation: Four, Duke Zhou wished to assassinate the king and establish Zi Ke, the king executed Duke Zhou, Ke fled to Yan.
First year of Duke Zhuang of Lu (Tong)
First year of Zi Ying of Zheng, Zi Wei's younger brother.

cells.content: 陳宣公杵臼元年杵臼，莊公弟。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xuan of Chen (Chu Jiu), Chu Jiu was Duke Zhuang's younger brother.
First year of Duke Min of Song (Jie)
Eight, attacked Ji, removed their capital city.

cells.content: 五十一王伐，隨告夫人心動，王卒軍中。
cells.translation: Fifty-one, king attacked, Sui informed consort's heart moved, king died in army.
First year of Duke Zhuang of Yan
Five, with Qi attacked Wei, installed Duke Hui.
First year of King Wen of Chu (Zi), began capital at Ying.

cells.content: 二伐申，過鄧，鄧甥曰楚可取，鄧侯不許。
cells.translation: Two, attacked Shen, passed Deng, Deng's nephew said Chu could be taken, Deng lord did not permit.
Jia Wu
Seven, stars fell like rain, together with rain.
Ten, Qi established Duke Hui, Qian Mu fled to Zhou.

cells.content: 八子糾來奔，與管仲俱避毋知亂。
cells.translation: Eight, Gong Zi Jiu came fleeing, with Guan Zhong avoided Wu Zhi disorder.
Twelve, Wu Zhi killed ruler self-established.
Wei Hui Gong Shuo re-entered. Fourteenth year

cells.content: 九魯欲與糾入，後小白，齊距魯，使生致管仲。
cells.translation: Nine, Lu wished to enter with Jiu, after Xiao Bai, Qi blocked Lu, made them deliver Guan Zhong alive.

cells.content: 齊桓公小白元年春，齊殺毋知。
cells.translation: First year of Qi Huan Gong Xiao Bai, spring, Qi killed Wu Zhi.
Ten, Qi attacked us, because of Jiu.

cells.content: 六息夫人，陳女，過蔡，蔡不禮，惡之。楚伐蔡，獲哀侯以歸。
cells.translation: Six, Xi consort, Chen woman, passed Cai, Cai did not treat courteously, hated it. Chu attacked Cai, captured Ai Hou and returned.
Eleven, Chu captured our lord.
Eleven, Zang Wen Zhong condoled Song flood.

cells.content: 九宋大水，公自罪。魯使臧文仲來弔。
cells.translation: Nine, Song great flood, duke self-blamed. Lu sent Zang Wen Zhong to condole.
Ten, Wan killed ruler, Qiu Mu had righteousness.
First year of King Xi

cells.content: 十三曹沫劫桓公。反所亡地。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Cao Mo hijacked Huan Gong. Returned lost territory.
Five, assembled with Lu people at Ke.

cells.content: 宋桓公御說元年莊公子。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Huan of Song (Yu Yue), Zhuang Gong's son.
Seven, began hegemony, assembled feudal lords at Juan.

cells.content: 二十八曲沃武公滅晉侯湣，以寶獻周，周命武公為晉君，并其地。
cells.translation: Twenty-eight, Quwo Wu Gong extinguished Jin Hou Min, presented treasures to Zhou, Zhou commanded Wu Gong to be Jin ruler, annexed its territory.

cells.content: 鄭厲公元年厲公亡後十七歲復入。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Li of Zheng, Duke Li fled seventeen years later re-entered.

cells.content: 晉武公稱并晉，已立三十八年，不更元，因其元年。
cells.translation: Jin Wu Gong Cheng annexed Jin, had established thirty-eight years, did not change first year, continued its first year.
Twenty, buried at Yong, began with human sacrifice.
Twelve, attacked Deng extinguished it.
Two, feudal lords attacked us.
Jia Chen

cells.content: 三十九武公卒，子詭諸立，為獻公。
cells.translation: Thirty-nine, Wu Gong died, son Gui Zhu established, became Xian Gong.
First year of Qin De Gong, Wu Gong's younger brother.
First year of King Hui, took Chen consort.
First year of Jin Xian Gong Gui Zhu

cells.content: 二初作伏，祠社，磔狗邑四門。
cells.translation: Two, began making Fu sacrifice, sacrificed to She, split dogs at four gates.
First year of Chu Du Ao Su

cells.content: 二燕、衛伐王，王奔溫，立子穨。
cells.translation: Two, Yan and Wei attacked king, king fled to Wen, established Zi Kui.
First year of Qin Xuan Gong
Seven, took Wei woman. Wen Gong's younger brother.

cells.content: 十六伐王，王奔溫，立子穨。
cells.translation: Sixteen, attacked king, king fled to Wen, established Zi Kui.
First year of Cai Mu Hou Xi
Seventeen, Zheng seized our Zhong Fu.
Four, executed Kui, entered King Hui.
Seven, rescued Zhou disorder, entered king.

cells.content: 五太子母早死。惠后生叔帶。
cells.translation: Five, crown prince's mother died early. Hui consort gave birth to Shu Dai.

cells.content: 十四陳完自陳來奔，田常始此也。
cells.translation: Fourteen, Chen Wan came fleeing from Chen, Tian Chang began from this.
Five, attacked Li Rong, obtained Ji.
Four, established the Mi altar.
Five, younger brother Yun assassinated Du Ao and established himself.
Twenty-one, Duke Li's son Wan fled to Qi.
First year of Duke Wen of Zheng (Jie)
Twenty-three, the duke went to Qi to view the suburban sacrifice.
First year of King Cheng of Chu (Yun)
First year of Duke Xi of Cao (Yi)
Eight, completely slaughtered the former Jin duke's various sons.
Nine, began fortifying Jiang capital.
First year of Duke Yi of Wei (Chi)
Jia Yin
Ten, granted the Qi lord his mandate.

cells.content: 十二太子申生居曲沃，重耳居蒲城，夷吾居屈。驪姬故。
cells.translation: Twelve, Crown Prince Shen Sheng resided at Quwo, Chong Er at Pu city, Yi Wu at Qu. Because of Li Ji.
Twenty-three, attacked Shan Rong, for Yan's sake.
First year of Duke Cheng of Qin

cells.content: 三十二莊公弟叔牙鴆死。慶父弒子般。季友奔陳，立湣公。
cells.translation: Thirty-two, Duke Zhuang's younger brother Shu Ya died by poison. Qing Fu assassinated Zi Ban. Ji You fled to Chen, established Duke Min.
First year of Duke Min of Lu

cells.content: 十六滅魏、耿、霍。始封趙夙耿，畢萬魏，始此。
cells.translation: Sixteen, extinguished Wei, Geng, Huo. First enfeoffed Zhao Su at Geng, Bi Wan at Wei, began from this.
First year of Duke Zhao of Cao

cells.content: 二慶父殺湣公。季友自陳立申，為釐公。殺慶父。
cells.translation: Two, Qing Fu assassinated Duke Min. Ji You from Chen established Shen as Duke Xi. Assassinated Qing Fu.

cells.content: 十七申生將軍，君子知其廢。
cells.translation: Seventeen, Shen Sheng as general, gentleman knew he would be deposed.

cells.content: 翟伐我。公好鶴，士不戰，滅我國。國怨，惠公亂，滅其後，更立黔牟弟。衛戴公元年
cells.translation: Di attacked us. The duke favored cranes, soldiers would not fight, extinguished our state. State resented, Duke Hui caused chaos, extinguished his descendants, changed to establish Qian Mu's younger brother. First year of Duke Dai of Wei

cells.content: 魯釐公申元年哀姜喪自齊至。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xi of Lu (Shen), Ai Jiang's funeral arrived from Qi.

cells.content: 二十七殺女弟魯莊公夫人，淫故。
cells.translation: Twenty-seven, killed younger sister Duke Zhuang's consort, because of licentiousness.
First year of Duke Mu of Qin (Ren Hao)

cells.content: 衛文公燬元年戴公弟也。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Wen of Wei (Hui), Duke Dai's younger brother.

cells.content: 二十八為衛築楚丘。救戎狄伐。
cells.translation: Twenty-eight, built Chu Hill for Wei. Rescued from Rong Di attack.

cells.content: 十九荀息以幣假道于虞以伐虢，滅下陽。
cells.translation: Nineteen, Xun Xi used bribes to borrow passage through Yu to attack Guo, extinguished Xia Yang.

cells.content: 二齊桓公率諸侯為我城楚丘。
cells.translation: Two, Qi Huan Gong led feudal lords to build Chu Hill for us.
Jia Zi

cells.content: 二十九與蔡姬共舟，蕩公，公怒，歸蔡姬。
cells.translation: Twenty-nine, shared boat with Cai Ji, she shook the duke, duke angered, returned Cai Ji.
Eighteen, because of the woman, Qi attacked us.
First year of Duke Xiang of Yan

cells.content: 三十率諸侯伐蔡，蔡潰，遂伐楚，責包茅貢。
cells.translation: Thirty, led feudal lords to attack Cai, Cai collapsed, then attacked Chu, demanded the tribute of wrapped mugwort.

cells.content: 二十一申生以驪姬讒自殺。重耳奔蒲，夷吾奔屈。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, Shen Sheng committed suicide because of Li Ji's slander. Chong Er fled to Pu, Yi Wu fled to Qu.
Four, welcomed bride from Jin.

cells.content: 十六齊伐我，至陘，使屈完盟。
cells.translation: Sixteen, Qi attacked us, reached Xing, sent Qu Wan to make alliance.

cells.content: 二十二滅虞、虢。重耳奔狄。
cells.translation: Twenty-two, extinguished Yu and Guo. Chong Er fled to Di.
Thirty-two, led feudal lords to attack Zheng.
Twenty-three, Yi Wu fled to Liang.

cells.content: 十八伐許，許君肉袒謝，楚從之。
cells.translation: Eighteen, attacked Xu, Xu lord bared flesh to apologize, Chu followed.
Twenty-five, King Xiang established, feared Tai Shu.
Twenty-five, attacked Di, because of Chong Er.

cells.content: 三十公疾，太子茲父讓兄目夷賢，公不聽。
cells.translation: Thirty, duke ill, Crown Prince Zi Fu yielded to elder brother Mu Yi as worthy, duke did not listen.
First year of Duke Gong of Cao
First year of King Xiang, feudal lords established the king.

cells.content: 九齊率我伐晉亂，至高梁還。
cells.translation: Nine, Qi led us to attack Jin's chaos, returned at Gao Liang.

cells.content: 三十五夏，會諸侯于葵丘。天子使宰孔賜胙，命無拜。
cells.translation: Thirty-five, summer, assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu. The Son of Heaven sent minister Kong to grant sacrificial meat, commanded no bowing.

cells.content: 二十六公卒，立奚齊，里克殺之。及卓子。立夷吾。
cells.translation: Twenty-six, duke died, established Xi Qi, Li Ke assassinated him and Zhu Zi. Established Yi Wu.
Nine, Yi Wu sent Xi Rui with bribes to seek entry.

cells.content: 三十一公薨，未葬，齊桓會葵丘。
cells.translation: Thirty-one, duke died, not yet buried, Qi Huan assembled Kui Qiu.

cells.content: 三十六使隰朋立晉惠公。
cells.translation: Thirty-six, sent Xi Peng to establish Jin Duke Hui.

cells.content: 晉惠公夷吾元年誅里克，倍秦約。
cells.translation: First year of Jin Duke Hui (Yi Wu), executed Li Ke, broke Qin alliance.
Ten, Pi Zheng Zi Bao fled came.

cells.content: 宋襄公茲父元年目夷相。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xiang of Song (Zi Fu), Mu Yi as chancellor.

cells.content: 三戎伐我，太叔帶召之。欲誅叔帶，叔帶奔齊。
cells.translation: Three, Rong attacked us, Tai Shu Dai summoned them. Wished to execute Shu Dai, Shu Dai fled to Qi.
Eleven, rescued king attacked Rong, Rong withdrew.
Twenty-three, attacked Huang.

cells.content: 二十四有妾夢天與之蘭，生穆公蘭。
cells.translation: Twenty-four, consort dreamed heaven gave orchid, gave birth to Duke Mu Lan.

cells.content: 三十八使管仲平戎于周，欲以上卿禮，讓，受下卿。
cells.translation: Thirty-eight, sent Guan Zhong to pacify Rong at Zhou, wished to use upper minister ritual, declined, accepted lower minister.
Jia Xu

cells.content: 三十九使仲孫請王，言叔帶，王怒。
cells.translation: Thirty-nine, sent Zhong Sun to request king, spoke of Shu Dai, king angered.
Four, famine, requested grain, Qin gave us.

cells.content: 十三丕豹欲無與，公不聽，輸晉粟，起雍至絳。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Pi Bao wished not to give, duke did not listen, transported Jin grain, from Yong to Jiang.
First year of Duke Mu of Chen (Kuan)
Five, Qin famine, requested grain, Jin broke it.
Twenty-six, extinguished Liu, Ying.

cells.content: 十五五月，日有食之。不書，史官失之。
cells.translation: Fifteen, fifth month, solar eclipse. Not recorded, historian erred.
Six, Qin captured Duke Hui, re-established him.

cells.content: 十五以盜食善馬士得破晉。
cells.translation: Fifteen, because robber ate good horse knight obtained broke Jin.
First year of Duke Zhuang of Cai (Jia Wu)

cells.content: 四十二王以戎寇告齊，齊徵諸侯戍周。
cells.translation: Forty-two, king with Rong invaders informed Qi, Qi summoned feudal lords to defend Zhou.

cells.content: 七重耳聞管仲死，去翟之齊。
cells.translation: Seven, Chong Er heard Guan Zhong died, left Di to Qi.
Sixteen, established officials for east of river.

cells.content: 七隕五石。六鷁退飛，過我都。
cells.translation: Seven, five stones fell. Six lu retreated flying, passed our capital.
First year of Duke Xiao of Qi (Zhao)

cells.content: 十九滅梁。梁好城，不居，民罷，相驚，故亡。
cells.translation: Nineteen, extinguished Liang. Liang fond of fortifying, did not dwell, people exhausted, mutually alarmed, therefore perished.

cells.content: 三十三執宋襄公，復歸之。
cells.translation: Thirty-three, seized Duke Xiang of Song, returned him.
Twelve, summoned Chu alliance.
Fourteen, Shu Dai returned to Zhou.
Five, returned king's younger brother Dai.
Thirteen, crown prince Yu hostage Qin fled returned.
Thirteen, Hong battle, Chu defeated duke.
Thirty-five, duke went to Chu, Song attacked us.
Jia Shen
Six, attacked Song, because did not join alliance.
Fourteen, Yu established, became Duke Huai.

cells.content: 二十三迎重耳於楚，厚禮之，妻之女。重耳願歸。
cells.translation: Twenty-three, welcomed Chong Er from Chu, treated him thickly, married daughter. Chong Er wished to return.
Thirty-five, Chong Er passed, treated thickly.
Fourteen, duke died from Hong battle.

cells.content: 二十三重耳從齊過，無禮。
cells.translation: Twenty-three, Chong Er from Qi passed, no courtesy.

cells.content: 十六重耳過，無禮，僖負羈私善。
cells.translation: Sixteen, Chong Er passed, no courtesy, Xi Fu Ji privately befriended.

cells.content: 三十六重耳過，無禮，叔詹諫。
cells.translation: Thirty-six, Chong Er passed, no courtesy, Shu Zhan admonished.
Sixteen, king fled to Si. Si is Zheng territory.

cells.content: 晉文公元年誅子圉。魏武子為魏大夫，趙衰為原大夫。咎犯曰「求霸莫如內王。」
cells.translation: First year of Duke Wen of Jin, executed Zi Yu. Wei Wu Zi as Wei grandee, Zhao Shuai as Yuan grandee. Jiu Fan said 'seek hegemony none better than bringing in king.'
Twenty-four, sent troops to send Chong Er.
First year of Duke Cheng of Song (Wang Chen)
Seventeen, Jin brought in king.
Twenty-five, wished to bring in king, army at river.
Three, Song submitted.
Three, doubly allied with Chu and became close to Jin.
First year of Duke Cheng of Wei (Zheng)

cells.content: 十孝公薨，弟潘因衛公子開方殺孝公子，立潘。
cells.translation: Ten, Duke Xiao died, younger brother Pan used Wei's Gong Zi Kai Fang to assassinate Duke Xiao's son, established Pan.
Four, rescued Song, avenged Cao and Wei's humiliation.
Thirty-nine, sent Zi Yu to attack Song.
Four, Chu attacked us, we urgently appealed to Jin.
Twenty, king hunted at He Yang.
Twenty-eight, duke went to Jian Tu to assemble for audience.

cells.content: 齊昭公潘元年會晉敗楚，朝周王。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhao of Qi (Pan), assembled with Jin to defeat Chu, audience with Zhou king.

cells.content: 五侵曹伐衛，取五鹿，執曹伯。諸侯敗楚而朝河陽，周命賜公土地。
cells.translation: Five, invaded Cao and attacked Wei, took Wu Lu, seized Cao lord. Feudal lords defeated Chu and audience at He Yang, Zhou mandate granted duke land.
Twenty-eight, assembled with Jin to attack Chu and audience with Zhou.
Forty, Jin defeated Zi Yu at Cheng Pu.
Five, Jin rescued us, Chu troops withdrew.

cells.content: 三晉伐我，取五鹿。公出奔，立公子瑕會晉朝，復歸衛。
cells.translation: Three, Jin attacked us, took Wu Lu. Duke fled, established Gong Zi Xia assembled with Jin for audience, returned to Wei.
Sixteen, assembled with Jin to attack Chu, audience with Zhou king.
Fourteen, assembled with Jin to attack Chu, audience with Zhou king.

cells.content: 二十一晉伐我，執公，復歸之。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, Jin attacked us, seized duke, then returned him.
Four, Jin gave Wei to Song.
First year of Duke Gong of Chen (Shuo)

cells.content: 七聽周歸衛成公。與秦圍鄭。
cells.translation: Seven, listened to Zhou and returned Duke Cheng of Wei. Allied with Qin to besiege Zheng.
Thirty, besieged Zheng, upon hearing words withdrew.
Five, Zhou entered Duke Cheng, restored Wei.

cells.content: 四十三秦、晉圍我，以晉故。
cells.translation: Forty-three, Qin and Jin besieged us, because of Jin.
Nine, Duke Wen died.

cells.content: 三十二將襲鄭，蹇叔曰不可。
cells.translation: Thirty-two, about to raid Zheng, Jian Shu said it was not permissible.
Forty-five, Duke Wen died.
Jia Wu
Thirty-three, Duke Xi died.
Six, Di invaded us.

cells.content: 晉襄公驩元年破秦于殽。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xiang of Jin (Huan), defeated Qin at Xiao.
Thirty-three, raided Zheng, Jin defeated us at Xiao.

cells.content: 鄭穆公蘭元年秦襲我，弦高詐之。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Mu of Zheng (Lan), Qin raided us, Xian Gao deceived them.
First year of Duke Wen of Lu (Xing)
Two, attacked Wei, Wei attacked us.

cells.content: 三十四敗殽將亡歸，公復其官。
cells.translation: Thirty-four, defeated at Xiao about to flee and return, duke restored their offices.

cells.content: 四十六王欲殺太子立職，太子恐，與傅潘崇殺王。王欲食熊蹯死，不聽。自立為王。
cells.translation: Forty-six, king wished to kill crown prince and establish Zhi, crown prince feared, with tutor Pan Chong assassinated king. King wished to eat bear paw and die, they did not permit. Self-established as king.
Nine, Jin attacked us, we attacked Jin.
Three, Qin avenged our Xiao defeat, defeated us at Wang.

cells.content: 三十五伐晉報殽，敗我于汪。
cells.translation: Thirty-five, attacked Jin to avenge Xiao, defeated us at Wang.

cells.content: 楚穆王商臣元年以其太子宅賜崇，為相。
cells.translation: First year of King Mu of Chu (Shang Chen), granted his crown prince's residence to Chong, made him chancellor.
Three, duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 四秦伐我，取王官，我不出。
cells.translation: Four, Qin attacked us, took Wang Guan, we did not go out.

cells.content: 三十六以孟明等伐晉，晉不敢出。
cells.translation: Thirty-six, with Meng Ming and others attacked Jin, Jin did not dare go out.
Two, Jin attacked us.
Five, attacked Qin, besieged Yuan and Xin Cheng.

cells.content: 三十七晉伐我，圍邧、新城。
cells.translation: Thirty-seven, Jin attacked us, besieged Yuan and Xin Cheng.
Three, extinguished Jiang.
Twelve, duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 六趙成子、欒貞子、霍伯、臼季皆卒。
cells.translation: Six, Zhao Cheng Zi, Luan Zhen Zi, Huo Bo, Jiu Ji all died.
Four, extinguished Liu and Liao.

cells.content: 七公卒。趙盾為太子少，欲更立君，恐誅，遂立太子為靈公。
cells.translation: Seven, duke died. Zhao Dun was crown prince young, wished to change ruler, feared execution, therefore established crown prince as Ling Gong.

cells.content: 三十九繆公薨。葬殉以人，從死者百七十人，君子譏之，故不言卒。
cells.translation: Thirty-nine, Duke Mu died. Buried with human sacrifice, those who died 170 people, gentleman criticized, therefore did not say died.

cells.content: 晉靈公夷皋元年趙盾專政。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Ling of Jin (Yi Gao), Zhao Dun monopolized government.
First year of Duke Kang of Qin (Ying)
Seventeen, Gong Sun Gu killed Cheng Gong.
Thirty-three, King Xiang died.

cells.content: 八王使衛來求金以葬，非禮。
cells.translation: Eight, king sent Wei to seek gold for burial, not according to ritual.

cells.content: 二秦伐我，取武城，報令孤之戰。
cells.translation: Two, Qin attacked us, took Wu Cheng, avenged Ling Gu battle.

cells.content: 宋昭公杵臼元年襄公之子。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhao of Song (Chu Jiu), Xiang Gong's son.
First year of King Qing
Three, led feudal lords to rescue Zheng.
Eight, attacked Zheng, because submitted to Jin.
Ten, Chu attacked us.
Jia Chen

cells.content: 四伐秦，拔少梁。秦取我北徵。
cells.translation: Four, attacked Qin, took Shao Liang. Qin took our Bei Zheng.

cells.content: 四晉伐我，取少梁。我伐晉取北徵。
cells.translation: Four, Jin attacked us, took Shao Liang. We attacked Jin took Bei Zheng.
First year of Duke Wen of Cao (Shou)
First year of Duke Huan of Yan

cells.content: 十一敗長翟于鹹而歸，得長翟。
cells.translation: Eleven, defeated Tall Di at Xian, returned, got Tall Di.
Four, defeated Tall Di at Chang Qiu.

cells.content: 六秦取我羈馬。與秦戰河曲，秦師遁。
cells.translation: Six, Qin took our Ji Ma. Fought Qin at He Qu, Qin army fled.

cells.content: 六伐晉，取羈馬。怒，與我大戰河曲。
cells.translation: Six, attacked Jin, took Ji Ma. Angry, fought great battle with us at He Qu.
Seven, got Sui Hui.
Seven, Jin deceived got Sui Hui.

cells.content: 六頃王崩。公卿爭政，故不赴。
cells.translation: Six, King Qing died. Ministers contended for government, therefore did not report death.

cells.content: 十四彗星入北斗，周史曰：七年，宋、齊、晉君死。
cells.translation: Fourteen, comet entered Northern Dipper, Zhou historian said: seven years, Song, Qi, Jin rulers die.

cells.content: 二十昭公卒。弟商人殺太子自立，是為懿公。
cells.translation: Twenty, Duke Zhao died. Younger brother Shang Ren killed crown prince self-established, became Duke Yi.

cells.content: 八趙盾以車八百乘納捷菑，平王室。
cells.translation: Eight, Zhao Dun with 800 chariots installed Jie Gai, pacified royal house.
First year of King Zhuang of Chu (Lu)
First year of Duke Ling of Chen (Ping Guo)
First year of King Kuang

cells.content: 十五六月辛丑，日蝕，齊伐我。
cells.translation: Fifteen, sixth month Xin Chou, solar eclipse, Qi attacked us.
First year of Duke Yi of Qi (Shang Ren)
Nine, we entered Cai.
Thirty-four, Jin attacked us. Zhuang Hou died.
Six, Qi entered our outer wall.
Two, did not gain people's hearts.
Three, extinguished Yong.

cells.content: 九襄夫人使衛伯殺昭公。弟鮑立。
cells.translation: Nine, Xiang consort made Wei Bo kill Duke Zhao. Younger brother Bao established.
First year of Duke Wen of Cai (Shen)
Seventeen, Qi attacked us.
Three, attacked Lu.
Eleven, led feudal lords to pacify Song.

cells.content: 宋文公鮑元年昭公弟。晉率諸侯平我。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Wen of Song (Bao), Duke Zhao's younger brother. Jin led feudal lords pacified us.

cells.content: 十八襄仲殺嫡，立庶子為宣公。
cells.translation: Eighteen, Xiang Zhong killed legitimate heir, established concubine's son as Xuan Gong.

cells.content: 四公刖邴歜父而奪閻職妻，二人共殺公，立桓公子惠公。
cells.translation: Four, duke amputated Bing Chou Fu's foot and took Yan Zhi's wife, two men together killed duke, established Huan Gong's son Hui Gong.

cells.content: 魯宣公俀元年魯立宣公，不正，公室卑。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xuan of Lu (Bei), Lu established Xuan Gong, not proper, ducal house lowly.

cells.content: 齊惠公元元年取魯濟西之田。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Hui of Qi (Yuan), took Lu Ji Xi fields.
Thirteen, Zhao Dun rescued Chen and Song, attacked Zheng.
First year of Qin Duke Gong (He)

cells.content: 六伐宋、陳，以倍我服晉故。
cells.translation: Six, attacked Song and Chen, because doubled submission to Jin.

cells.content: 三楚、鄭伐我，以我倍楚故也。
cells.translation: Three, Chu and Zheng attacked us, because doubled Chu.

cells.content: 二十與楚侵陳，遂侵宋。晉使趙盾伐我，以倍晉故。
cells.translation: Twenty, with Chu invaded Chen, then invaded Song. Jin sent Zhao Dun attacked us, because doubled Jin.
Jia Yin
Six, King Kuang died.
Two, crown prince Cheng Fu defeated Tall Di.

cells.content: 十四趙穿殺靈公，趙盾使穿迎公子黑诈于周，立之。趙氏賜公族。
cells.translation: Fourteen, Zhao Chuan assassinated Duke Ling, Zhao Dun made Chuan welcome Gong Zi Hei Lie from Zhou, established him. Zhao clan granted noble status.

cells.content: 四華元以羊羹故陷於鄭。
cells.translation: Four, Hua Yuan trapped in Zheng because of sheep stew.

cells.content: 二十一與宋師戰，獲華元。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, fought with Song army, captured Hua Yuan.
First year of King Ding
First year of Duke Cheng of Jin (Hei Lie), attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 八伐陸渾，至雒，問鼎輕重。
cells.translation: Eight, attacked Lu Hun, reached Luo, inquired tripod weight.
Five, ransomed Hua Yuan, fled returned. Besieged Cao.
Twelve, Song besieged us.
Twenty-two, Hua Yuan fled returned.

cells.content: 九若敖氏為亂，滅之。伐鄭。
cells.translation: Nine, Ruo Ao clan caused disorder, extinguished them. Attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 鄭靈公夷元年公子歸生以黿故殺靈公。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Ling of Zheng (Yi), Gong Zi Gui Sheng assassinated Duke Ling because of turtle.

cells.content: 三中行桓子荀林父救鄭，伐陳。
cells.translation: Three, Zhong Xing Huan Zi Xun Lin Fu rescued Zheng, attacked Chen.

cells.content: 十楚伐鄭，與我平。晉中行桓子距楚，救鄭，伐我。
cells.translation: Ten, Chu attacked Zheng, made peace with us. Jin Zhong Xing Huan Zi resisted Chu, rescued Zheng, attacked us.

cells.content: 鄭襄公堅元年靈公庶弟。楚伐我，晉來救。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xiang of Zheng (Jian), Duke Ling's younger brother. Chu attacked us, Jin came rescued.
Four, invaded Chen with Wei.
First year of Duke Huan of Qin
Thirty-two, invaded Chen with Jin.
Eleven, Jin and Wei invaded us.
Eight, seventh month, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 六與魯伐秦，獲秦諜，殺之絳市，六日而蘇。
cells.translation: Six, with Lu attacked Qin, captured Qin spy, executed Jiang market, revived after six days.
Three, Jin attacked us, captured spy.
Thirteen, attacked Chen, extinguished Shu Liao.
Thirteen, Chu attacked us.
First year of Duke Xuan of Yan

cells.content: 七使桓子伐楚。以諸侯師伐陳救鄭。成公薨。
cells.translation: Seven, sent Huan Zi attacked Chu. Led feudal lords army attacked Chen rescued Zheng. Duke Cheng died.

cells.content: 十四伐鄭，晉郤缺救鄭，敗我。
cells.translation: Fourteen, attacked Zheng, Jin Xi Que rescued Zheng, defeated us.

cells.content: 五楚伐我，晉來救，敗楚師。
cells.translation: Five, Chu attacked us, Jin came rescued, defeated Chu army.
Fourteen, month, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 十公卒。崔杼有寵，高、國逐之，奔衛。
cells.translation: Ten, duke died. Cui Zhu favored, Gao Guo drove out, fled Wei.

cells.content: 晉景公據元年與宋伐鄭。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Jing of Jin (Ju), attacked Zheng with Song.

cells.content: 衛穆公鸱元年齊崔杼來奔。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Mu of Wei (Chi), Qi Cui Zhu came fleeing.

cells.content: 十五夏徵舒以其母辱，殺靈公。
cells.translation: Fifteen, Xia Zheng Shu killed Duke Ling because of mother.
Six, Jin Song Chu attacked us.
First year of Duke Qing of Qi (Wu Ye)

cells.content: 十六率諸侯誅陳夏徵舒，立陳靈公子午。
cells.translation: Sixteen, led feudal lords executed Chen Xia Zheng Shu, established Chen Duke Ling's son Wu.

cells.content: 陳成公午元年靈公太子。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Cheng of Chen (Wu), Duke Ling's crown prince.
Jia Zi
Three, rescued Zheng, defeated by Chu at river.

cells.content: 十七圍鄭，鄭伯肉袒謝，釋之。
cells.translation: Seventeen, besieged Zheng, Zheng lord bared flesh apologized, released.
Fourteen, attacked Chen.
Eight, Chu besieged us, used humble words resolved.
Five, attacked Zheng.
Nineteen, besieged Song, because killed envoy.
Sixteen, killed Chu envoy, Chu besieged us.
Twenty-seven, killed crown prince Shangchen.
Three, made alliance at Song.
Six, invaded Zheng.
Three, attacked Zheng.
Twenty-two, defeated Qi at An.
Three, defeated Qi at An.
Twenty, attacked Zheng.
Eight, defeated Qi at Lang.
Twenty-five, defeated Qi at An.
Five, defeated Qi at An.

cells.content: 六救宋，執解揚，有使節。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Six, rescued Song, seized Jie Yang, had envoy credentials. Qin attacked us.
Twenty-eight, defeated Qi at An.

cells.content: 二十圍宋。五月，華元告子反以誠，楚罷。
cells.translation: Twenty, besieged Song. Fifth month, Hua Yuan informed Zi Fan sincerely, Chu withdrew.
Thirty, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-one, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-two, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-three, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-four, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-five, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-six, defeated Qi at An.
Thirty-eight, defeated Qi at An.
Forty, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-one, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-two, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-three, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-four, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-five, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-six, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-seven, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-eight, defeated Qi at An.
Forty-nine, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty-one, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty-two, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty-four, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty-six, defeated Qi at An.
Fifty-seven, defeated Qi at An.

cells.content: 七晉使郤克來齊，婦人笑之，克怒，歸去。
cells.translation: Seven, Jin sent Xi Ke to Qi, women laughed at him, Ke angered, returned home.

cells.content: 八使郤克使齊，婦人笑之，克怒歸。
cells.translation: Eight, sent Xi Ke to Qi, women laughed at him, Ke angered and returned.
Sixty, defeated Qi at An.
Sixty-one, defeated Qi at An.
Sixty-two, defeated Qi at An.
Sixty-three, defeated Qi at An.
Twenty, Duke Wen died.
Eighteen, Duke Xuan died.
Eight, Jin attacked defeated us.
Nine, attacked Qi, hostage Qiang, troops stopped.
Twenty-three, King Zhuang died.
First year of Duke Jing of Cai (Gu)

cells.content: 魯成公黑肱元年春，齊取我隆。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Cheng of Lu (Hei Gong), spring, Qi took our Long.
First year of King Gong of Chu (Shen)

cells.content: 二與晉伐齊，齊歸我汶陽，竊與楚盟。
cells.translation: Two, with Jin attacked Qi, Qi returned Wen Yang to us, secretly allied with Chu.

cells.content: 十晉郤克敗公於鞍，虜逢丑父。
cells.translation: Ten, Jin Xi Ke defeated duke at An, captured Peng Chou Fu.
Eleven, with Lu, Cao defeated Qi.

cells.content: 二秋，申公巫臣竊徵舒母奔晉，以為邢大夫。冬，伐衛、魯，救齊。
cells.translation: Two, autumn, Shen Gong Wu Chen stole Zheng Shu's mother fled to Jin, made her Xing grandee. Winter, attacked Wei, Lu, rescued Qi.

cells.content: 十一穆公薨。與諸侯敗齊，反侵地。楚伐我。
cells.translation: Eleven, Duke Mu died. With feudal lords defeated Qi, reversed invaded territory. Chu attacked us.
Three, assembled Jin, Song, Wei, Cao attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 十一頃公如晉，欲王晉，晉不敢受。
cells.translation: Eleven, Duke Qing went to Jin, wished to make Jin king, Jin did not dare accept.

cells.content: 十二始置六卿。率諸侯伐鄭。
cells.translation: Twelve, began establishing six ministers. Led feudal lords attacked Zheng.
First year of Duke Gong of Song (Xia)
First year of Duke Ding of Wei (Zang)
Seven, attacked Zheng.
Seventeen, Jin led feudal lords attacked us.
Jia Xu

cells.content: 四公如晉，晉不敬，公欲倍晉合於楚。
cells.translation: Four, duke went to Jin, Jin not respectful, duke wished to break Jin alliance with Chu.
Thirteen, Lu duke came, not respectful.
Four, Zi Fan rescued Zheng.

cells.content: 十八晉欒書取我氾。襄公薨。
cells.translation: Eighteen, Jin Luan Shu took our Fan. Duke Xiang died.
Twenty, King Ding died.

cells.content: 十四梁山崩。伯宗隱其人而用其言。
cells.translation: Fourteen, Liang Mountain collapsed. Bo Zong hid the person but used his words.

cells.content: 五伐鄭，倍我故也。鄭悼公來訟。
cells.translation: Five, attacked Zheng, because broke us. Duke Dao of Zheng came to accuse.

cells.content: 鄭悼公費元年公如楚訟。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Dao of Zheng (Fei), duke went to Chu to accuse.
First year of Duke Zhao of Yan
First year of King Jian

cells.content: 十五使欒書救鄭，遂侵蔡。
cells.translation: Fifteen, sent Luan Shu to rescue Zheng, then invaded Cai.
Seven, Jin invaded us.

cells.content: 二悼公薨。楚伐我，晉使欒書來救。
cells.translation: Two, Duke Dao died. Chu attacked us, Jin sent Luan Shu to rescue.
First year of Wu Shou Meng

cells.content: 十六以巫臣始通於吳而謀楚。
cells.translation: Sixteen, with Wu Chen began communicating with Wu to plot against Chu.
Seven, attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 鄭成公睔元年悼公弟也。楚伐我。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Cheng of Zheng (Mai), Dao Gong's younger brother. Chu attacked us.
Two, minister Wu came, plotted to attack Chu.
Seventeen, restored Zhao Wu's fields. Invaded Cai.
Nine, Jin attacked us.
Seventeen, Duke Qing died.

cells.content: 十八執鄭成公，伐鄭。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Eighteen, seized Zheng Duke Cheng, attacked Zheng. Qin attacked us.
Twenty-two, attacked Jin.
Nine, rescued Zheng. Winter, made alliance with Jin.

cells.content: 三與楚盟。公如晉，執公伐我。
cells.translation: Three, made alliance with Chu. Duke went to Jin, duke seized and attacked us.
Ten, duke went to Jin for funeral, concealed it.
First year of Duke Ling of Qi (Huan)
Four, Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
First year of Duke Li of Jin (Shou Man)

cells.content: 二十四與晉侯夾河盟，歸，倍盟。
cells.translation: Twenty-four, allied with Jin duke across river, returned and broke alliance.
Thirteen, assembled with Jin to attack Qin.
Four, attacked Qin.

cells.content: 三伐秦至涇，敗之，獲其將成差。
cells.translation: Three, attacked Qin to Jing, defeated them, captured their general Cheng Chai.
Twenty-six, Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
Eleven, Jin led us to attack Qin.
Seventeen, Jin led us to attack Qin.
Seven, Jin led us to attack Qin.
Jia Shen
Twelve, Duke Ding died.
First year of Duke Cheng of Cao (Fu Chu)
Fifteen, began communicating with Wu, assembled at Zhong Li.

cells.content: 五三郤讒伯宗，殺之，伯宗好直諫。
cells.translation: Five, three Xi slandered Bo Zong, assassinated him, Bo Zong was fond of direct remonstrance.
First year of Duke Jing of Qin
Fifteen, Xu feared Zheng, requested to move to Ye.
Thirteen, Hua Yuan fled to Jin, then returned.
First year of Duke Xian of Wei (Kan)
Two, Jin seized our duke and took him back.
Ten, assembled with Lu at Zhong Li.

cells.content: 十六宣伯告晉，欲殺季文子，文子得以義脫。
cells.translation: Sixteen, Xuan Bo informed Jin, wished to kill Ji Wen Zi, Wen Zi escaped using righteousness.
Six, defeated Chu at Yan Ling.

cells.content: 十六救鄭，不利。子反醉，軍敗，殺子反歸。
cells.translation: Sixteen, rescued Zheng, unfavorable. Zi Fan drunk, army defeated, assassinated Zi Fan and returned.
First year of Duke Ping of Song (Cheng)

cells.content: 十倍晉盟楚，晉伐我，楚來救。
cells.translation: Ten, broke Jin alliance with Chu, Jin attacked us, Chu came to rescue.
Thirteen, Duke Zhao died.
Eighteen, Duke Cheng died.

cells.content: 八欒書中行偃殺厲公，立襄公曾孫，為悼公。
cells.translation: Eight, Luan Shu and Zhong Xing Yan assassinated Duke Li, established Duke Xiang's great-grandson as Duke Dao.
Eighteen, made Yu Shi attack Song's Peng Cheng.
Three, Chu attacked Peng Cheng, enfeoffed Yu Shi.
Twelve, attacked Song with Chu.
First year of Duke Wu of Yan
Fourteen, King Jian died.

cells.content: 魯襄公午元年圍宋彭城。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Xiang of Lu (Wu), besieged Song's Peng Cheng.

cells.content: 十晉伐我，使太子光質於晉。
cells.translation: Ten, Jin attacked us, sent crown prince Guang as hostage to Jin.
First year of Duke Dao of Jin, besieged Song's Peng Cheng.
Nineteen, invaded Song, rescued Zheng.

cells.content: 四楚侵我，取犬丘。晉誅魚石，歸我彭城。
cells.translation: Four, Chu invaded us, took Quan Qiu. Jin executed Yu Shi, returned Peng Cheng to us.
Five, besieged Song's Peng Cheng.

cells.content: 十三晉伐敗我，兵次洧上，楚來救。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Jin attacked and defeated us, troops camped at Wei, Chu came to rescue.
Ling Wang first year gave birth to bearded child.
Two, assembled with Jin at Hu Lao fortress.
Two, led feudal lords to attack Zheng, fortified Hu Lao.

cells.content: 十四成公薨。晉率諸侯伐我。
cells.translation: Fourteen, Cheng Gong died. Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
Three, Wei Jiang insulted Yang Gan.

cells.content: 二十一使子重伐吳，至衡山。使何忌侵陳。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, sent Zi Chong to attack Wu, reached Heng Mountain. Sent He Ji to invade Chen.
Twenty-nine, broke Chu alliance, Chu invaded us.
First year of Duke Xi of Zheng (Yun)
Sixteen, Chu attacked us.
Four, duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 四魏絳說和戎、狄，狄朝晉。
cells.translation: Four, Wei Jiang persuaded to make peace with Rong and Di, Di came to Jin court.
Twenty-two, attacked Chen.
Thirty, Chu attacked us. Cheng Gong died.
Five, Ji Wen Zi died.
Twenty-three, attacked Chen.
First year of Duke Ai of Chen (Ruo)
Jia Wu
Twenty-five, besieged Chen.
Three, Chu besieged us, duke fled back.

cells.content: 五子駟使賊夜殺釐公，詐以病卒赴諸侯。
cells.translation: Five, Zi Si sent assassin to kill Xi Gong at night, falsely announced illness and death to feudal lords.
Eight, duke went to Jin.
Twenty-six, attacked Zheng.
Twenty-seven, Zheng invaded us.
First year of Duke Jian of Zheng (Jia), Xi Gong's son.

cells.content: 九與晉伐鄭，會河上，問公年十二，可冠，冠於衛。
cells.translation: Nine, with Jin attacked Zheng, assembled at river, asked duke's age twelve, could be capped, capped at Wei.
Eighteen, with Jin attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 九率齊、魯、宋、衛、曹伐鄭。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Nine, led Qi, Lu, Song, Wei, Cao to attack Zheng. Qin attacked us.
Thirteen, attacked Jin, Chu aided us.

cells.content: 二十七伐鄭，師于武城，為秦。
cells.translation: Twenty-seven, attacked Zheng, camped at Wu Cheng, for Qin.
Twelve, Jin led us to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 十三晉率我伐鄭。師曹鞭公幸妾。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Jin led us to attack Zheng. At Cao, duke favored consort.
Fourteen, Jin led us to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 二誅子駟。晉率諸侯伐我，我與盟。楚怒，伐我。
cells.translation: Two, executed Zi Si. Jin led feudal lords to attack us, we made alliance. Chu angered, attacked us.
Nine, Wang Shu fled to Jin.
Ten, Chu and Zheng invaded our western borders.

cells.content: 十九令太子光、高厚會諸侯鍾離。
cells.translation: Nineteen, ordered crown prince Guang and Gao Hou to assemble feudal lords at Zhong Li.

cells.content: 十率諸侯伐鄭。荀罃伐秦。
cells.translation: Ten, led feudal lords to attack Zheng. Xun Ying attacked Qin.
Fourteen, Jin attacked us.
Twenty-eight, sent Zi Nang to rescue Zheng.
Thirteen, Zheng attacked us, Wei came to rescue.
Fourteen, rescued Song.

cells.content: 三晉率諸侯伐我，楚來救。子孔作亂，子產攻之
cells.translation: Three, Jin led feudal lords to attack us, Chu came to rescue. Zi Kong caused disorder, Zi Chan attacked him.

cells.content: 十一三桓分為三軍，各將軍。
cells.translation: Eleven, three Huan divided into three armies, each commanded army.

cells.content: 十一率諸侯伐鄭，秦敗我櫟。公曰：「吾用魏絳九合諸侯，」賜之樂。
cells.translation: Eleven, led feudal lords to attack Zheng, Qin defeated us at Li. Duke said: 'I used Wei Jiang nine times to assemble feudal lords,' granted him music.

cells.content: 十五我使庶長鮑伐晉救鄭，敗之櫟。
cells.translation: Fifteen, we sent Shu Zhang Bao to attack Jin and rescue Zheng, defeated them at Li.
Twenty-nine, with Zheng attacked Song.
Fourteen, Chu and Zheng attacked us.
Fifteen, attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 四與楚伐宋，晉率諸侯伐我，秦來救。
cells.translation: Four, with Chu attacked Song, Jin led feudal lords attacked us, Qin came to rescue.
Twelve, duke went to Jin.
Twenty-five, Shou Meng died.

cells.content: 三十一吳伐我，敗之。共王薨。
cells.translation: Thirty-one, Wu attacked us, defeated them. King Gong died.
First year of Wu Zhu Fan, Chu defeated us.
Fourteen, solar eclipse.
Twenty-three, Wei Duke Xian came fleeing.

cells.content: 十四率諸侯大夫伐秦，敗棫林。
cells.translation: Fourteen, led feudal lords' grandees to attack Qin, defeated at Yu Lin.

cells.content: 十八晉諸侯大夫伐我，敗棫林。
cells.translation: Eighteen, Jin feudal lords' grandees attacked us, defeated at Yu Lin.

cells.content: 楚康王昭元年共王太子出奔吳。
cells.translation: First year of King Kang of Chu (Zhao), King Gong's crown prince fled to Wu.

cells.content: 十八孫文子攻公，公奔齊，立定公弟狄。
cells.translation: Eighteen, Sun Wen Zi attacked the duke, duke fled to Qi, established Duke Ding's younger brother Di.
Two, Ji Zi yielded the throne. Chu attacked us.
Fifteen, solar eclipse. Qi attacked us.
Twenty-four, attacked Lu.
Fifteen, Duke Dao died.
First year of Duke Shang of Wei (Di), Duke Ding's younger brother.
Jia Chen

cells.content: 十六齊伐我。地震。齊復伐我北鄙。
cells.translation: Sixteen, Qi attacked us. Earthquake. Qi again attacked our northern borders.
Twenty-five, attacked Lu.

cells.content: 晉平公彪元年我敗楚于湛阪。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Ping of Jin (Biao), we defeated Chu at Zhan Ban.
Three, Jin attacked us, defeated at Zhan Ban.
Seventeen, Qi attacked our northern borders.
Twenty-six, attacked Lu.
Twenty, attacked Chen.
Three, attacked Cao.
Thirteen, Song attacked us.
Twenty-two, Wei attacked us.
Eighteen, attacked Qi with Jin.
Twenty-seven, Jin besieged Lin Zi. Yan Ying.

cells.content: 三率魯、宋、鄭、衛圍齊，大破之。
cells.translation: Three, led Lu, Song, Zheng, Wei to besiege Qi, greatly defeated them.
Five, attacked Zheng.
Twenty-one, Jin led us to attack Qi.
Twenty-three, Duke Cheng died.

cells.content: 十一晉率我圍齊。楚伐我。
cells.translation: Eleven, Jin led us to besiege Qi. Chu attacked us.
Nineteen, Duke Wu died.

cells.content: 二十八廢光，立子牙為太子。光與崔杼殺牙自立。晉、衛伐我。
cells.translation: Twenty-eight, deposed Guang, established Zi Ya as crown prince. Guang and Cui Zhu assassinated Ya and self-established. Jin and Wei attacked us.
Four, attacked Qi with Wei.
Five, Jin led us to attack Qi.
First year of Duke Wu of Cao (Sheng)
Twelve, Zi Chan became minister.
First year of Duke Wen of Yan
Twenty, solar eclipse.
First year of Duke Zhuang of Qi
Twenty-one, duke went to Jin. Sun eclipsed twice.
Six, Lu Duke Xiang came. Assassinated Yang She Hu.
Twenty-two, Confucius born.

cells.content: 三晉欒逞來奔，晏嬰曰「不如歸之」。
cells.translation: Three, Jin Luan Ying came fleeing, Yan Ying said 'better to return him'.
Seven, Luan Ying fled to Qi.

cells.content: 四欲遣欒逞入曲沃伐晉，取朝歌。
cells.translation: Four, wished to send Luan Ying to enter Quwo to attack Jin, take Zhao Ge.
Nine, Qi attacked us.
Twenty-four, invaded Qi. Sun eclipsed twice.
Five, feared Jin communicated with Chu, Yan Ying plotted.

cells.content: 十一與齊通。率陳、蔡伐鄭救齊。
cells.translation: Eleven, communicated with Qi. Led Chen, Cai attacked Zheng rescued Qi.
Twenty, Chu led us to attack Zheng.
Forty-three, Chu led us to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 十七范宣子為政。我請伐陳。
cells.translation: Seventeen, Fan Xuan Zi governed. We requested to attack Chen.

cells.content: 二十五齊伐我北鄙，以報孝伯之師。
cells.translation: Twenty-five, Qi attacked our northern borders, to avenge Xiao Bo's army.

cells.content: 六晉伐我，報朝歌。崔杼以莊公通其妻，殺之，立其弟，為景公。
cells.translation: Six, Jin attacked us, avenged Zhao Ge. Cui Zhu because Duke Zhuang seduced his wife, assassinated him, established his younger brother as Duke Jing.

cells.content: 十伐齊至高唐，報太行之役。
cells.translation: Ten, attacked Qi to Gao Tang, avenged Tai Xing campaign.
Twenty-nine, duke went to Jin, alliance not concluded.

cells.content: 十二吳伐我，以報舟師之役，射殺吳王。
cells.translation: Twelve, Wu attacked us, to avenge naval campaign, shot and killed Wu king.
Twenty-one, Zheng attacked us.
Eighteen, attacked Chen, entered Chen.
First year of Duke Yi of Yan

cells.content: 十三諸樊伐楚，迫巢門，傷射以薨。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Zhu Fan attacked Chu, pressed Nest Gate, injured by arrow died.
Jia Yin

cells.content: 齊景公杵臼元年如晉，請歸衛獻公。
cells.translation: First year of Qi Duke Jing (Chu Jiu), went to Jin, requested return Wei Duke Xian.

cells.content: 十一誅衛殤公，復入獻公。
cells.translation: Eleven, executed Wei Duke Shang, re-entered Duke Xian.
Thirteen, led Chen, Cai attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 十二齊、晉殺殤公，復內獻公。
cells.translation: Twelve, Qi, Jin executed Duke Shang, re-entered Duke Xian.
Twenty-two, Chu led us to attack Zheng.
Nineteen, Chu led Chen, Cai to attack us.
First year of Wu Yu Ji
Twenty-seven, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 二慶封欲專，誅崔氏，杼自殺。
cells.translation: Two, Qing Feng wished monopoly, executed Cui clan, Zhu committed suicide.
First year of Wei Duke Xian (Kan) later
Twenty-eight, duke went to Chu. Buried King Kang.

cells.content: 三冬，鮑、高、欒氏謀慶封，發兵攻慶封，慶封奔吳。
cells.translation: Three, winter, Bao, Gao, Luan clans plotted against Qing Feng, sent troops attacked Qing Feng, Qing Feng fled to Wu.
Fifteen, King Kang died.
Four, Duke Yi died.
Three, Qi Qing Feng came fleeing.
First year of King Jing

cells.content: 二十九吳季札來觀周樂，盡知樂所為。
cells.translation: Twenty-nine, Wu Ji Zha came to observe Zhou music, knew all music meanings.

cells.content: 四吳季札來使，與晏嬰歡。
cells.translation: Four, Wu Ji Zha came as envoy, happy with Yan Ying.

cells.content: 十四吳季札來，曰「晉政卒歸韓、魏、趙。」
cells.translation: Fourteen, Wu Ji Zha came, said 'Jin government finally belongs to Han, Wei, Zhao.'
First year of Chu Xiong Ju Ao

cells.content: 二十二吳季札謂子產曰：政將歸子，子以禮，幸脫於厄矣。」
cells.translation: Twenty-two, Wu Ji Zha told Zi Chan: 'Government will belong to you, if you use ritual, fortunately escape calamity.'

cells.content: 燕惠公元年齊高止來奔。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Hui of Yan, Qi Gao Zhi came fleeing.

cells.content: 四守門閽殺餘祭。季札使諸侯。
cells.translation: Four, gatekeeper assassinated Yu Ji. Ji Zha made feudal lords.
First year of Duke Xiang of Wei (Wu)

cells.content: 四十九為太子取楚女，公通焉，太子殺公自立。
cells.translation: Forty-nine, took Chu woman for crown prince, duke seduced her, crown prince assassinated duke self-established.

cells.content: 二十三諸公子爭寵相殺，又欲殺子產，子成止之。
cells.translation: Twenty-three, various princes contended for favor killed each other, also wished to kill Zi Chan, Zi Cheng stopped them.
Thirty-one, Duke Xiang died.
Three, Wang Ji Fu became Ling Yin.
First year of Duke Ling of Cai (Ban)

cells.content: 魯昭公稠元年昭公年十九，有童心。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Zhao of Lu (Chou), Duke Zhao age nineteen, had childish heart.
Seventeen, Qin Hou Zi came fleeing.

cells.content: 三十六公弟后子奔晉，車千乘。
cells.translation: Thirty-six, duke's younger brother Hou Zi fled to Jin, thousand chariots.

cells.content: 四令尹圍殺郟敖，自立為靈王。
cells.translation: Four, Ling Yin Wei assassinated Ju Ao, self-established as King Ling.

cells.content: 二公如晉，至河，晉謝還之。
cells.translation: Two, duke went to Jin, reached river, Jin apologized returned him.
Eight, Tian Wu Yu sent woman.
Eighteen, Qi Tian Wu Yu came to send a woman.

cells.content: 楚靈王圍元年共王子，肘玉。
cells.translation: First year of King Ling of Chu (Wei), King Gong's son, Zhou Yu.

cells.content: 九晏嬰使晉，見叔向，曰「齊政歸田氏。」叔向曰：「晉公室卑。」
cells.translation: Nine, Yan Ying sent to Jin, saw Shu Xiang, said 'Qi governance belongs to Tian clan.' Shu Xiang said: 'Jin ducal house is lowly.'
Twenty-seven, summer, went to Jin. Winter, went to Chu.

cells.content: 六公欲殺公卿立幸臣，公卿誅幸臣，公恐，出奔齊。
cells.translation: Six, duke wished to kill ministers and establish favored servants, ministers executed favored servants, duke feared, fled to Qi.
Four, claimed illness would not assemble with Chu.

cells.content: 三夏，合諸侯宋地，盟。伐吳朱方，誅慶封。冬，報我，取三城。
cells.translation: Three, summer, assembled feudal lords in Song territory, made alliance. Attacked Wu Zhu Fang, executed Qing Feng. Winter, avenged us, took three cities.
Six, claimed illness would not assemble with Chu.
Seventeen, claimed illness would not assemble with Chu.

cells.content: 二十八子產曰：三國不會。
cells.translation: Twenty-eight, Zi Chan said: Three states will not assemble.
Ten, Chu executed Qing Feng.
Jia Zi
Twenty-one, Qin Hou Zi returned to Qin.
Forty, duke died. Hou Zi returned from Jin.
Four, led feudal lords to attack Wu.
Eleven, Chu led feudal lords to attack us.

cells.content: 十二公如晉，請伐燕，入其君。
cells.translation: Twelve, duke went to Jin, requested to attack Yan, entered their ruler.

cells.content: 二十二齊景公來，請伐燕，入其君。
cells.translation: Twenty-two, Qi Duke Jing came, requested to attack Yan, entered their ruler.
First year of Duke Ai of Qin
Five, attacked Wu, camped at Qian Xi.
Nine, Qi attacked us.
Twelve, Chu attacked us, camped at Qian Xi.
Seven, Ji Wu Zi died. Solar eclipse.
Thirteen, entered Yan ruler.
Twenty-three, entered Yan ruler.
Six, seized Shu Yin refugee entered Zhang Hua.
Nine, consort Jiang had no sons.

cells.content: 燕悼公元年惠公歸至卒。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Dao of Yan, Duke Hui returned and died.

cells.content: 八公如楚，楚留之。賀章華臺。
cells.translation: Eight, duke went to Chu, Chu detained him. Congratulated Zhang Hua Tower.

cells.content: 七就章華臺，內亡人實之。滅陳。
cells.translation: Seven, went to Zhang Hua Tower, inside filled with refugees. Extinguished Chen.
First year of Duke Ling of Wei

cells.content: 三十五弟招作亂，哀公自殺。
cells.translation: Thirty-five, younger brother Zhao caused disorder, Duke Ai committed suicide.
Eight, younger brother Qi Ji led troops to pacify Chen.

cells.content: 陳惠公吳元年哀公孫也。楚來定我。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Hui of Chen (Wu), Duke Ai's grandson. Chu came to pacify us.

cells.content: 二十六春，有星出婺女。七月，公薨。
cells.translation: Twenty-six, spring, star appeared in Wu Nu. Seventh month, duke died.
Forty-four, Duke Ping died.
First year of Duke Zhao of Jin (Yi)

cells.content: 十醉殺蔡侯，使棄疾圍之。棄疾居之，為蔡侯。
cells.translation: Ten, drunk assassinated Cai lord, made Qi Ji besiege him. Qi Ji dwelt there, became Cai lord.
First year of Duke Yuan of Song (Zuo)

cells.content: 十二靈侯如楚，楚殺之，使棄疾居之，為蔡侯。
cells.translation: Twelve, Duke Ling went to Chu, Chu assassinated him, made Qi Ji dwell there, became Cai lord.

cells.content: 十二朝晉至河，晉謝之歸。
cells.translation: Twelve, audience with Jin to the river, Jin apologized and returned.
Eighteen, duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 十一王伐徐以恐吳，次乾谿。民罷於役，怨王。
cells.translation: Eleven, king attacked Xu to intimidate Wu, camped at Qian Xi. People exhausted from service, resented the king.
Five, duke went to Jin, audience with successor ruler.
First year of Cai Lord Lu, Duke Jing's son.
Thirty-six, duke went to Jin.
First year of Wu Yu Mei

cells.content: 十二棄疾作亂自立，靈王自殺。復陳、蔡。
cells.translation: Twelve, Qi Ji caused disorder and self-established, King Ling committed suicide. Restored Chen and Cai.
Five, Chu King Ping restored Chen, established Duke Hui.

cells.content: 二楚平王復我，立景侯子廬。
cells.translation: Two, Chu King Ping restored us, established Duke Jing's son Lu.
First year of Duke Ding of Zheng (Ning)

cells.content: 楚平王居元年共王子，抱玉。
cells.translation: First year of King Ping of Chu (Ju), Gong Wang's son, Bao Yu.
First year of Duke Gong of Yan
Jia Xu
Eighteen, queen's crown prince died.

cells.content: 十五日蝕。公如晉，晉留之葬，公恥之。
cells.translation: Fifteen, solar eclipse. Duke went to Jin, Jin detained for burial, duke ashamed.

cells.content: 二王為太子取秦女，好，自取之。
cells.translation: Two, king took Qin woman for crown prince, favored, took himself.
First year of Duke Ping of Cao (Xu)

cells.content: 六公卒。六卿彊，公室卑矣。
cells.translation: Six, duke died. Six ministers strong, ducal house lowly.
First year of Wu Liao

cells.content: 十七五月朔，日蝕。彗星見辰。
cells.translation: Seventeen, fifth month new moon, solar eclipse. Comet seen at Chen.
First year of Duke Qing of Jin (Qu Ji)
Four, fought with Wu.

cells.content: 五火，欲禳之，子產曰：不如脩德。
cells.translation: Five, fire, wished exorcise, Zi Chan said better cultivate virtue.
Two, fought with Chu.
Eight, fire.
Eleven, fire.
Ten, fire.
Four, Duke Ping died.
Six, fire.
Five, Duke Gong died.
Nineteen, earthquake.
First year of Duke Dao of Cao (Wu)
First year of Duke Ping of Yan

cells.content: 二十齊景公與晏子狩，入魯問禮。
cells.translation: Twenty, Qi Duke Jing with Yan Ying hunted, entered Lu asked ritual.
Twenty-six, hunted Lu borders, thereby entered Lu.

cells.content: 七誅伍奢、尚，太子建奔宋，伍胥奔吳。
cells.translation: Seven, executed Wu She Shang, crown prince Jian fled Song, Wu Xu fled Wu.

cells.content: 十公毋信。詐殺諸公子。楚太子建來奔，見亂，之鄭。
cells.translation: Ten, duke did not believe. Falsely killed various princes. Chu crown prince Jian came fleeing, saw disorder, went Zheng.

cells.content: 九平侯薨。靈侯孫東國殺平侯子而自立。
cells.translation: Nine, Duke Ping died. Ling Hou grandson Dong Guo killed Ping Hou son self-established.
Eight, Chu crown prince Jian came fleeing from Song.
Five, Wu Yuan came fleeing.

cells.content: 二十一公如晉至河，晉謝之，歸。日蝕。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, duke went Jin river, Jin apologized, returned. Solar eclipse.
Eight, Cai lord came fleeing.
First year of Cai Dao Hou Dong Guo, fled Chu.
Twenty-two, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 六周室亂，公平亂，立敬王。
cells.translation: Six, Zhou court disorder, duke pacified disorder, established King Jing.
First year of King Jing
Twenty-three, earthquake.
Ten, Wu attacked defeated us.
Fifteen, Wu defeated army, took Hu Shen.
Eleven, Chu Jian caused disorder, executed him.
Eight, Gong Zi Guang defeated Chu.
Twenty-four, dove nested.

cells.content: 十一吳卑梁人爭桑，伐取我鍾離。
cells.translation: Eleven, Wu Bei Liang people disputed mulberry, attacked took Zhong Li.
First year of Cai Zhao Hou Shen, Dao Hou younger brother.
Twelve, duke went Jin, requested bring king.
Jia Shen

cells.content: 二十五公欲誅季氏，三桓氏攻公，公出居鄆。
cells.translation: Twenty-five, duke wished execute Ji clan, three Huan clans attacked duke, duke went resided Yun.

cells.content: 二十六齊取我鄆以處公。
cells.translation: Twenty-six, Qi took our Yun to place duke.

cells.content: 三十二彗星見。晏子曰：「田氏有德於齊，可畏。」
cells.translation: Thirty-two, comet appeared. Yan Ying said: 'Tian clan has virtue in Qi, fearful.'

cells.content: 十知櫟、趙鞅內王於王城。
cells.translation: Ten, Zhi Li and Zhao Yang brought the king into Wang Cheng.

cells.content: 十三欲立子西，子西不肯。秦女子立，為昭王。
cells.translation: Thirteen, wished to establish Zi Xi, Zi Xi refused. Qin woman established him, became King Zhao.
First year of Duke Jing of Song (Tou Man)

cells.content: 楚昭王珍元年誅無忌以說眾。
cells.translation: First year of King Zhao of Chu (Zhen), executed Wu Ji to please the multitude.

cells.content: 十二公子光使專諸殺僚，自立。
cells.translation: Twelve, Gong Zi Guang made Zhuan Zhu assassinate Liao, self-established.

cells.content: 二十八公如晉，求入，晉弗聽，處之乾侯。
cells.translation: Twenty-eight, duke went to Jin, sought entry, Jin did not permit, placed him at Qian Hou.

cells.content: 十二六卿誅公族，分其邑。各使其子為大夫。
cells.translation: Twelve, six ministers executed ducal clan, divided their fiefs. Each made their son a grandee.
First year of Duke Xiang of Cao
First year of Wu He Lu

cells.content: 二十九公自乾侯如鄆。齊侯曰：主君。公恥之，復之乾侯。
cells.translation: Twenty-nine, duke from Qian Hou went to Yun. Qi lord said: 'Lord.' Duke was ashamed, returned to Qian Hou.
First year of Duke Xian of Zheng (Chan)
Fourteen, Duke Qing died.

cells.content: 四吳三公子來奔，封以扞吳。
cells.translation: Four, Wu three princes came fleeing, enfeoffed them to guard against Wu.
Three, three princes fled to Chu.
Thirty-one, solar eclipse.
First year of Duke Ding of Jin (Wu)
Five, Wu attacked our Liu and Qian.
Four, attacked Chu Liu and Qian.
Ten, Jin made feudal lords build city for us.
Thirty-two, duke died at Qian Hou.
Two, led feudal lords to build city for Zhou.

cells.content: 五平公弟通殺襄公自立。
cells.translation: Five, Duke Ping's younger brother Tong assassinated Duke Xiang self-established.

cells.content: 魯定公宋元年昭公喪自乾侯至。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Ding of Lu (Song), Duke Zhao's funeral arrived from Qian Hou.

cells.content: 七囊瓦伐吳，敗我豫章。蔡侯來朝。
cells.translation: Seven, Nang Wa attacked Wu, defeated us at Yu Zhang. Cai lord came for audience.
Ten, audience with Chu, detained because of fur coat.
First year of Duke Yin of Cao

cells.content: 六楚伐我，迎擊，敗之，取楚之居巢。
cells.translation: Six, Chu attacked us, counterattacked, defeated them, took Chu's Ju Chao.
Jia Wu

cells.content: 九蔡昭侯留三歲，得裘，故歸。
cells.translation: Nine, Cai Duke Zhao detained three years, obtained fur coat, therefore returned.

cells.content: 十二與子常裘，得歸，如晉，請伐楚。
cells.translation: Twelve, with Zi Chang fur coat, obtained return, went to Jin, requested to attack Chu.
Fourteen, with Jin led feudal lords to invade Chu.
Six, Zhou with us led feudal lords to invade Chu.
Thirty-one, Chu Bao Xu requested aid.

cells.content: 十吳、蔡伐我，入郢，昭王亡。伍子胥鞭平王墓。
cells.translation: Ten, Wu and Cai attacked us, entered Ying, King Zhao fled. Wu Zi Xu whipped King Ping's tomb.
Twenty-nine, contended with Cai for precedence.

cells.content: 十三與衛爭長。楚侵我，吳與我伐楚，入郢。
cells.translation: Thirteen, contended with Wei for precedence. Chu invaded us, Wu with us attacked Chu, entered Ying.
Nine, with Cai attacked Chu, entered Ying.

cells.content: 五陽虎執季桓子，與盟，釋之。日蝕。
cells.translation: Five, Yang Hu seized Ji Huan Zi, made alliance with him, released him. Solar eclipse.

cells.content: 十一秦救至，吳去，昭王復入。
cells.translation: Eleven, Qin rescue arrived, Wu withdrew, King Zhao re-entered.
First year of Duke Huai of Chen (Liu)
First year of Duke Jing of Cao (Lu)

cells.content: 十六王子朝之徒作亂故，王奔晉。
cells.translation: Sixteen, because Zi Zhao's followers caused disorder, king fled to Jin.

cells.content: 十二吳伐我番，楚恐，徙鄀。
cells.translation: Twelve, Wu attacked our Fan, Chu feared, moved to Ru.
Ten, Lu invaded us.
First year of Duke Jian of Yan
Eleven, attacked Chu, took Fan.
Seventeen, Liu Zi welcomed king, Jin entered king.
Seven, Qi attacked us.
Forty-five, invaded Wei. Attacked Lu.
Nine, entered Zhou King Jing.
Thirty-two, Qi invaded us.

cells.content: 八陽虎欲伐三桓，三桓攻陽虎，虎奔陽關。
cells.translation: Eight, Yang Hu wished to attack three Huan, three Huan attacked Yang Hu, Hu fled Yang Pass.
Forty-six, Lu attacked us. We attacked Lu.
Ten, attacked Wei.

cells.content: 十四子西為民泣，民亦泣，蔡昭侯恐。
cells.translation: Fourteen, Zi Xi wept for people, people also wept, Cai Duke Zhao feared.
Thirty-three, Jin, Lu invaded attacked us.

cells.content: 四公如吳，吳留之，因死吳。
cells.translation: Four, duke went to Wu, Wu detained him, died in Wu.
Four, Duke Jing died.

cells.content: 十三陳懷公來，留之，死於吳。
cells.translation: Thirteen, Chen Duke Huai came, detained him, died in Wu.
Nine, attacked Yang Hu, Hu fled to Qi.
Forty-seven, imprisoned Yang Hu, Hu fled to Jin.
Eleven, Yang Hu came fleeing.
Thirty-six, Duke Ai died.
Sixteen, Yang Hu came fleeing.
First year of Chen Duke Min (Yue)
First year of Cao Bo Yang
Thirteen, Duke Xian died.

cells.content: 十公會齊侯於夾谷。孔子相。齊歸我地。
cells.translation: Ten, duke assembled Qi lord at Jia Gu. Confucius assisted. Qi returned our territory.
First year of Qin Duke Hui, comet appeared.
First year of Duke Sheng of Zheng, Zheng increasingly weak.
Two, gave birth to Zhao Gong, Huai Gong, Jian Gong.

cells.content: 三國人有夢眾君子立社宮，謀亡曹，振鐸請待公孫彊，許之。
cells.translation: Three, state people dreamed crowd of gentlemen stood at She Palace, plotted to extinguish Cao, Zhen Duo requested wait for Gong Sun Qiang, permitted.

cells.content: 十二齊來歸女樂，季桓子受之，孔子行。
cells.translation: Twelve, Qi came returned female musicians, Ji Huan Zi accepted them, Confucius left.
Fifty, sent female musicians to Lu.
Thirty-seven, attacked Cao.
Four, Wei attacked us.
Jia Chen
Fifteen, Zhao Yang attacked Fan, Zhong Xing.

cells.content: 三十八孔子來，祿之如魯。
cells.translation: Thirty-eight, Confucius came, gave salary like in Lu.
Thirty-nine, crown prince Kuai Kui fled.
Six, Confucius came.

cells.content: 六公孫彊好射，獻鴈，君使為司城，夢者子行。
cells.translation: Six, Gong Sun Qiang fond of archery, offered geese, ruler made him Si Cheng, dreamers' son departed.
Five, Zi Chan died.

cells.content: 十九伐越，敗我，傷闔閭指，以死。
cells.translation: Nineteen, attacked Yue, defeated us, injured He Lu finger, died from it.
Fifteen, Duke Ding died. Solar eclipse.

cells.content: 二十一滅胡。以吳敗，我倍之。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, extinguished Hu. Because Wu defeated us, broke with them.
Twenty-two, Zheng attacked us.
Six, attacked Song.
First year of Wu King Fu Chai
First year of Duke Ai of Lu (Jiang)
Fifty-four, attacked Jin.

cells.content: 十八趙鞅圍范、中行朝歌。齊、衛伐我。
cells.translation: Eighteen, Zhao Yang besieged Fan and Zhong Xing at Zhao Ge. Qi and Wei attacked us.
Twenty-two, led feudal lords to besiege Cai.
Forty-one, attacked Jin.
Eight, Wu attacked us.

cells.content: 二十五楚伐我，以吳怨故。
cells.translation: Twenty-five, Chu attacked us, because of Wu resentment.
Two, attacked Yue.
Fifty-five, transported grain to Fan and Zhong Xing clan.

cells.content: 十九趙鞅圍范、中行，鄭來救，我敗之。
cells.translation: Nineteen, Zhao Yang besieged Fan and Zhong Xing, Zheng came to rescue, we defeated them.

cells.content: 四十二靈公薨。蒯聵子輒立。晉納太子蒯聵于戚。
cells.translation: Forty-two, Duke Ling died. Kuai Kui's son Zhe established. Jin brought crown prince Kuai Kui to Qi.

cells.content: 二十六畏楚，私召吳人，乞遷于州來，州來近吳。
cells.translation: Twenty-six, feared Chu, secretly summoned Wu people, begged to move to Zhou Lai, Zhou Lai near Wu.

cells.content: 八救范、中行氏，與趙鞅戰於鐵，敗我師。
cells.translation: Eight, rescued Fan and Zhong Xing clan, fought with Zhao Yang at Tie, defeated our army.
Three, earthquake.

cells.content: 二十五孔子過宋，桓魋惡之。
cells.translation: Twenty-five, Confucius passed through Song, Huan Hui disliked him.
First year of Wei Chu Gong (Zhe)
Ten, Song attacked us.
First year of Duke Xian of Yan
Fifty-seven, begged to rescue Fan clan.

cells.content: 二十一趙鞅拔邯鄲、柏人，有之。
cells.translation: Twenty-one, Zhao Yang took Han Dan and Bo Ren, possessed them.
Ten, Duke Hui died.
Twenty-eight, grandees together executed Duke Zhao.

cells.content: 五十八景公薨。立嬖姬子為太子。
cells.translation: Fifty-eight, Duke Jing died. Established favored consort's son as crown prince.

cells.content: 二十二趙鞅敗范中行，中行奔齊。伐衛。
cells.translation: Twenty-two, Zhao Yang defeated Fan Zhong Xing, Zhong Xing fled to Qi. Attacked Wei.
First year of Duke Dao of Qin
Three, Jin attacked us, because of rescuing Fan clan.
First year of Duke Cheng of Cai (Shuo)

cells.content: 齊晏孺子元年田乞詐立陽生，殺孺子。
cells.translation: First year of Qi Yan Ru Zi, Tian Qi falsely established Yang Sheng, killed Ru Zi.
Twenty-seven, rescued Chen, king died at Cheng Fu.
Twenty-eight, attacked Cao.
Thirteen, Wu attacked us, Chu came to rescue.
Thirteen, Song attacked us.
Seven, attacked Chen.

cells.content: 七公會吳王于繒。吳徵百牢，季康子使子貢謝之。
cells.translation: Seven, duke assembled with Wu king at Zeng. Wu demanded hundred sacrificial animals, Ji Kang Zi sent Zi Gong to decline.
First year of Duke Dao of Qi (Yang Sheng)
Twenty-four, invaded Wei.
First year of King Hui of Chu (Zhang)
Twenty-nine, invaded Zheng, besieged Cao.
Five, Jin invaded us.
Fourteen, Song besieged us, Zheng rescued us.
Eight, Lu assembled with us at Zeng.
Jia Yin

cells.content: 八吳為邾伐我，至城下，盟而去。齊取我三邑。
cells.translation: Eight, Wu for Zhu attacked us, reached city walls, made alliance and withdrew. Qi took our three towns.
Two, attacked Lu, took three towns.

cells.content: 二子西召建子勝於吳，為白公。
cells.translation: Two, Zi Xi summoned Jian Zi Sheng from Wu, became Bai Gong.
Thirty, Cao doubled us, we extinguished them.
Fifteen, Song extinguished Cao, captured Bo Yang.
Nine, attacked Lu.
Three, attacked Chen, because of Chen and Wu alliance.

cells.content: 三十一鄭圍我，敗之于雍丘。
cells.translation: Thirty-one, Zheng besieged us, defeated them at Yong Qiu.
Sixteen, doubled Chu, allied with Wu.

cells.content: 十五圍宋，敗我師雍丘，伐我。
cells.translation: Fifteen, besieged Song, defeated our army at Yong Qiu, attacked us.
Ten, with Wu attacked Qi.

cells.content: 四吳、魯伐我。鮑子殺悼公，齊人立其子壬為簡公。
cells.translation: Four, Wu and Lu attacked us. Bao Zi assassinated Duke Dao, Qi people established his son Ren as Duke Jian.
Twenty-seven, sent Zhao Yang to attack Qi.
Four, attacked Chen.
Thirty-two, attacked Zheng.
Eight, Confucius came from Chen.

cells.content: 十一與魯伐齊救陳。誅五員。
cells.translation: Eleven, with Lu attacked Qi to rescue Chen. Executed Wu Yuan.

cells.content: 十一齊伐我。冉有言，故迎孔子，孔子歸。
cells.translation: Eleven, Qi attacked us. Ran You spoke, therefore welcomed Confucius, Confucius returned.

cells.content: 齊簡公元年魯與吳敗我。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Jian of Qi, Lu with Wu defeated us.
Nine, Confucius returned to Lu.
Twelve, with Lu defeated Qi.

cells.content: 十二與吳會橐皋。用田賦。
cells.translation: Twelve, with Wu assembled at Tao Gao. Used field tax.

cells.content: 六白公勝數請子西伐鄭，以父怨故。
cells.translation: Six, Bai Gong Sheng repeatedly requested Zi Xi to attack Zheng, because of father's resentment.
Ten, duke went to Jin, with Wu assembled at Tao Gao.
Eighteen, Song attacked us.
Thirteen, with Lu assembled at Tao Gao.
Thirteen, with Wu assembled at Huang Chi.
Thirty, with Wu assembled at Huang Chi, contended for precedence.
Seven, attacked Chen.
Thirty-five, Zheng defeated our army.
Nineteen, defeated Song army.
Fourteen, with Jin assembled at Huang Chi.

cells.content: 十四西狩獲麟。衛出公來奔。
cells.translation: Fourteen, western hunt captured unicorn. Wei Chu Gong came fleeing.

cells.content: 四田常殺簡公，立其弟驁，為平公，常相之，專國權。
cells.translation: Four, Tian Chang assassinated Duke Jian, established his younger brother Ao as Duke Ping, Chang became chancellor, monopolized state power.
Twelve, father Kuai Kui entered, Zhe fled.

cells.content: 十五子服景伯使齊，子貢為介，齊歸我侵地。
cells.translation: Fifteen, Zi Fu Jing Bo sent to Qi, Zi Gong as intermediary, Qi returned our invaded territory.

cells.content: 齊平公驁元年景公孫也。齊自是稱田氏。
cells.translation: First year of Duke Ping of Qi (Ao), Duke Jing's grandson. Qi from this called Tian clan.

cells.content: 三十七熒惑守心，子韋曰「善。」
cells.translation: Thirty-seven, Mars guarded Heart, Zi Wei said 'good.'
First year of Duke Zhuang of Wei (Kuai Kui)
Sixteen, Confucius died.

cells.content: 十白公勝殺令尹子西，攻惠王。葉公攻白公，白公自殺。惠王復國。
cells.translation: Ten, Bai Gong Sheng assassinated Ling Yin Zi Xi, attacked King Hui. Ye Gong attacked Bai Gong, Bai Gong committed suicide. King Hui restored the state.
Twenty-three, Chu extinguished Chen, assassinated Duke Min.

cells.content: 三莊公辱戎州人，戎州人與趙簡子攻莊公，出奔。
cells.translation: Three, Duke Zhuang insulted Rong Zhou people, Rong Zhou people with Zhao Jian Zi attacked Duke Zhuang, fled.
Eighteen, Yue defeated us.
Jia Zi
Forty-three, King Jing died.
Eighteen, died at twenty-seven.
Four, died at twenty-five.
Thirty-five, died at thirty-seven.
Fourteen, died, son Duke Li Gong established.
Twelve, died at fifty-seven.
Forty-six, died at fourteen.

cells.content: 衛君起元年石傅逐起出，輒復入。
cells.translation: First year of Wei Jun Qi, Shi Fu drove Qi out, Zhe re-entered.
Fourteen, died at nineteen.
Twenty-four, died at thirty-eight.
Sixteen, died at twenty-eight.
Nineteen, died at twenty-three.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：儒者斷其義，馳說者騁其辭，不務綜其終始；

translations.text: The Grand Historian says: The Confucians sever their meanings, the galloping explainers gallop with their words, they do not strive to comprehensively grasp beginning and end;

sentences.zh: 歷人取其年月，數家隆於神運，譜諜獨記世謚，其辭略，欲一觀諸要難。

translations.text: The calendar makers take their years and months, several schools exalt divine destiny, the chronological records and secret accounts only record posthumous titles, their words are concise, but to view the essentials comprehensively is difficult.

sentences.zh: 於是譜十二諸侯，自共和訖孔子，表見春秋、國語學者所譏盛衰大指著于篇，為成學治古文者要刪焉。

translations.text: Therefore I have calendared the twelve feudal lords, from the Gonghe administration until Confucius, making manifest in tables the great outlines of rise and decline criticized by Spring and Autumn Annals and Discourses of the States scholars, written in this chapter as a key summary for those who study and treat ancient texts.

The Grand Historian says: The Confucians sever their meanings, the galloping explainers gallop with their words, they do not strive to comprehensively grasp beginning and end; The calendar makers take their years and months, several schools exalt divine destiny, the chronological records and secret accounts only record posthumous titles, their words are concise, but to view the essentials comprehensively is difficult. Therefore I have calendared the twelve feudal lords, from the Gonghe administration until Confucius, making manifest in tables the great outlines of rise and decline criticized by Spring and Autumn Annals and Discourses of the States scholars, written in this chapter as a key summary for those who study and treat ancient texts.
